SuzuranKhas:FFafterPower.NAME: Foxfire Growth
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of this turn, gain #b%d #yFoxfire (triggers first), then remove this power.

SuzuranKhas:FoxCursePower.NAME: Fox Curse
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, take #b%d damage, then increase #yFox Curse by #b8. Before a card applies Fox Curse, this start-of-turn effect triggers once.

SuzuranKhas:DrawAddPower.NAME: Extra Draw
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, draw #b%d additional cards.

SuzuranKhas:OfudaAddPower.NAME: Ofuda Bonus
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of combat, if your #yOfuda count is odd, gain #b%d #yOfuda.

SuzuranKhas:AshHealPower.NAME: Ash Healing
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you exhaust a card, heal #b%d HP.

SuzuranKhas:OfudaReducePower.NAME: Ofuda Deduction
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of turn, remove this power. If you take damage, remove this power and lose #b%d #yOfuda.

SuzuranKhas:DiffusionPower.NAME: Diffusion
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of turn, gain #b%d #yRegeneration and #yThorns, then add #b%d #yDazed to your discard pile.

SuzuranKhas:CircleOfLifePower.NAME: Circle of Life
DESCRIPTIONS: Your next #b%d Power cards cost 0 and return to your draw pile.

SuzuranKhas:AwakeningPower.NAME: Awakening
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of next turn, fully heal.

SuzuranKhas:OfudaCompensationPower.NAME: Ofuda Compensation
DESCRIPTIONS: You are facing powerful enemies. Upon victory, gain #b1 #yOfuda!
